verses.roman:
"gopīnātha-paṭṭanāyake yabe cāṅge caḍāilā
tāra sevaka saba āsi' prabhure kahilā

synonyms: gopīnātha-paṭṭanāyake—Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka; yabe—when; cāṅge—on the cāṅga; caḍāilā—they lifted; tāra sevaka—his servants; saba—all; āsi'-coming; prabhure kahilā—informed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: "When Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka was lifted onto the cāṅga," he said, "all his servants went to inform Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
